remarks: The multiplicative structure of ` Z/nZ ` is the same as the quotient ring it is based on.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
znval2.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) $.
znval2.u $e |- U = ( ZZring /s ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) $.
znval2.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
znmul $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( .r ` U ) = ( .r ` Y ) ) $.
